snippet: Out since Feb. 19 with a concussion, Chicago captain Jonathan Toews hopes to return to the ice when the Blackhawks start their first-round playoff series against Phoenix Thursday.
abstract: Chicago Blackhawks captain Jonathan Toews, sidelined with a concussion for nearly two months, hopes to return to the ice when the Blackhawks start their first-round playoff series against Phoenix Coyotes.
lead_paragraph: Out since Feb. 19 with a concussion, Chicago captain Jonathan Toews hopes to return to the ice when the Blackhawks start their first-round playoff series against Phoenix Thursday.

headline.seo: Blackhawks Eager for Jonathan Toews’s Return
headline.main: Blackhawks Star Sidelined by Concussion Hopes to Return for Playoffs
headline.print_headline: Blackhawks Star Sidelined by Concussion Hopes to Return for Playoffs
